name: Day 9: After Delay
description:
Welcome to day 9 of 15 in the Figma prototype challenge! Today will be focused on using After Delay to create looping animations. In the file you will find:

  1. A gif demonstrating the animation
  2. A workspace for you to build your prototype
  3. The built out prototype to use as reference
  4. Community examples demonstrating other applications of the feature


Feel free to follow the prompt or create a new, unique prototype using After Delay. Whatever you choose to do, don't forget to post a Remix or publish a new Community File with the tag FigmaPrototypeChallenge! Happy prototyping! ðŸŽ‰
